about_the_game:
You are alone at home. Hidden in the dark corners and dusty shelves, you discover old tapes that hold the secrets of the past. But these tapes are far from ordinary; each one is a key that pulls you into the depths of time, offering clues to understand the tragedy that befell you and your family.

In the game "Tempter," you travel through time, uncovering lost memories and dark secrets. Each tape gradually reveals what happened to you and your family, guiding you to complete the unfinished task they left behind. Through their experiences and the traces they left, you learn how to take revenge on the demon.

This story, filled with fear and suspense, helps you better understand what happened to your family with each tape you find, and strengthens you in your fight against the demon. Solving mysteries, completing puzzles, and making the right choices are in your hands. As you track the demon, danger awaits you every step of the way.

Gather your courage, uncover dark secrets, and take your revenge on the demon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Tempter" is a suspenseful first-person horror game that shows how humans can be even more dangerous than demons when they gain power. It centers on the struggle to save one's soul against a demon after breaking a pact.
